senses.gloss: Something handed down from an ancestor or predecessor.
senses.example: His legacy lives on through his charitable foundation.

senses.gloss: Conforming to the law or to rules; able to be defended with logic or justification.
senses.example: She raised several legitimate concerns about the plan.

senses.gloss: Full of or shedding light; bright or shining.
senses.example: The luminous moon illuminated the night sky.
